itemData.name: Earthen Leg Armor
itemData.htmlTooltip:
Earthen Leg Armor
Requires Level 80
Use: Permanently attach earthen armor onto pants to increase resilience rating by 40 and Stamina by 28.

Enchanting the item causes it to become soulbound.
1 Charge
Sell Price: 2

itemData.name: Frosthide Leg Armor
itemData.htmlTooltip:
Frosthide Leg Armor
Requires Level 80
Use: Permanently attach frosthide armor onto pants to increase Stamina by 55 and Agility by 22.

Enchanting the item causes it to become soulbound.
1 Charge
Sell Price: 2

itemData.name: Icescale Leg Armor
itemData.htmlTooltip:
Icescale Leg Armor
Requires Level 80
Use: Permanently attach icescale armor onto pants to increase attack power by 75 and critical strike rating by 22.

Enchanting the item causes it to become soulbound.
1 Charge
Sell Price: 2

itemData.name: Jormungar Leg Armor
itemData.htmlTooltip:
Jormungar Leg Armor
Requires Level 70
Use: Permanently attach jormungar armor onto pants to increase Stamina by 45 and Agility by 15.

Can only be attached to leg armor in your inventory. Wearer must be level 70 or higher.
1 Charge
Sell Price: 2

itemData.name: Nerubian Leg Armor
itemData.htmlTooltip:
Nerubian Leg Armor
Requires Level 70
Use: Permanently attach nerubian armor onto pants to increase attack power by 55 and critical strike rating by 15.

Enchanting the item causes it to become soulbound.
1 Charge
Sell Price: 2

itemData.name: Glove Reinforcements
itemData.htmlTooltip:
Glove Reinforcements
240 Armor
Requires Level 60
Use: Permanently increase the armor on a pair of gloves by 240. Only useable on items level 60 and above.
1 Charge
Sell Price: 75

itemData.name: Heavy Borean Armor Kit
itemData.htmlTooltip:
Heavy Borean Armor Kit
Requires Level 70
Use: Permanently increase the Stamina of an item worn on the head, chest, shoulders, legs, hands or feet by 18.

Can only be attached to armor in your inventory. Wearer must be level 70 or higher.
1 Charge
Sell Price: 75

itemData.name: Borean Armor Kit
itemData.htmlTooltip:
Borean Armor Kit
Requires Level 70
Use: Permanently increase the Stamina of an item worn on the head, chest, shoulders, legs, hands or feet by 12.

Can only be attached to armor in your inventory. Wearer must be level 70 or higher.
1 Charge
Sell Price: 75

itemData.name: Fur Lining - Arcane Resist
itemData.htmlTooltip:
Fur Lining - Arcane Resist
Permanently enchant bracers to increase your Arcane resistance by 70.

Can only be used on the leatherworker's bracers, and doing so will cause them to become soulbound. Fur Lining requires at least 400 skill in Leatherworking to remain active.

itemData.name: Fur Lining - Attack Power
itemData.htmlTooltip:
Fur Lining - Attack Power
Permanently enchant bracers to increase attack power by 130.

Can only be used on the leatherworker's bracers, and doing so will cause them to become soulbound. Fur Lining requires at least 400 skill in Leatherworking to remain active.

itemData.name: Jormungar Leg Reinforcements
itemData.htmlTooltip:
Jormungar Leg Reinforcements
Permanently attach jormungar reinforcements onto your pants, increasing Stamina by 55 and Agility by 22.

Can only attach to your own armor, and attaching causes the item to become soulbound.
